customer_addr:
8812 N. Old Forestry Rd.
Salem, IN 47167

citations.narrative:
This is a search inspection.
The applicant is selling fox kits without a valid USDA license via their online business site. The applicant was previously
informed through two phone conversations on March 23, 2022 and December 8, 2022 that a license is required to sell or
negotiate the sale of foxes for uses other than for food, fur, or fiber.
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act
and Regulations. The facility needs to obtain a USDA license/registration or discontinue regulated activities.
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license/registration is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
Additional Inspectors:
REBECCA NANNEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
This is a search inspection. 
The applicant is selling fox kits without a valid USDA license via their online business site.  The applicant was previously 
informed through two phone conversations on March 23, 2022 and December 8, 2022 that a license is required to sell or 
negotiate the sale of foxes for uses other than for food, fur, or fiber.  
 
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act 
and Regulations. The facility needs to obtain a USDA license/registration or discontinue regulated activities.  
 
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license/registration is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
REBECCA NANNEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
